comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: Yup, an authenticated wardrobe/unlock endpoint is definitely on my list. It’s a bit down the line — am working on an implementation of the proposed Guild API, and after that I’m probably going to do the v2 WvW endpoints.

comments.author: rodadams.5963
comments.body:
Not sure if this is already on the list somewhere, but there are a many different “account unlocks” in the game, and being able to pull them up in an API would be nice.

This includes:

  • Home instance nodes.
  • LS S2 chapter unlocks, and later HoT access.
  • Deluxe mode (Mistfire Wolf, new char golem, etc)
  • Hall of Monuments progression. (Can I haz Black Moa? Fellblade?)
  • Weapon/Armor skins
  • Dyes
  • PvP reward tracks
  • Outfits
  • Finishers
  • Mail Carriers

I’m likely forgetting a few here.
